title: BREAKING: SNL Writer Who Attacked Barron Trump Just Got Suspended INDEFINITELY
text:
WATCH: Greg Gutfeld Calls Inauguration Protesters “Cowardly Thugs With Hygiene Issues” 
The remark sparked nationwide outrage, with more than 100,000 individuals signing a Change.org petition asking for the writer to be fired. I sincerely apologize for the insensitive tweet. I deeply regret my actions & offensive words. It was inexcusable & I'm so sorry. 
— Katie Rich (@katiemaryrich) January 23, 2017 
Rich made her account private, although she would later make a public apology tweet, which conspicuously did not apologize directly to the Trump family.   
Rich’s tweet was so offensive that even Chelsea Clinton seemed to admonish Rich in a tweet, although she couldn’t help getting in a shot at President Trump. Barron Trump deserves the chance every child does-to be a kid. Standing up for every kid also means opposing @POTUS policies that hurt kids. 
— Chelsea Clinton (@ChelseaClinton) January 22, 2017 
Rich’s original tweet sparked condemnation around the Twittersphere, as well as charges of a double standard. 'member when the three networks led their evening newscasts w/ a story about a congressional aide who criticized the Obama girls? I 'member. pic.twitter.com/6k0oPQmuJ1 
— T. Becket Adams (@BecketAdams) January 20, 2017 
Sadly, this is not the first time that Barron has been a target of the left. Last November, leftist talk show host Rosie O’Donnell made news by re-tweeting a video that claimed that Barron Trump had autism. Rosie would pull a Rich and make her account private and then apologize.
